籤詩版本二:
Anadziponya pachipata chosema cha torii pansi pa thanthwe kuti amubwezere munthu.
Ndani angachipeze ngati mwakonzekera msanga, palibe amene angayende padziko lonse lapansi.
詩意:
Hexagram imeneyi imapanga chithunzi cha mbalame yamkuwa pa thanthwe.
Chizindikiro cha zabwino zonse.
解曰: Idyani popanda nsomba. Kukhala woyera ndi wokondwa ndi kusauka. Dikirani Tetra Pak. Mphamvu ndi anthu.
籤詩故事一:
◇Kukoma mtima kumakumana ndi Yehova
Mu Mzera wa Tang, Xue Li (614-683), dzina laulemu Rengui, anabadwira ku Longmen, Jiangzhou (tsopano Hejin, Shanxi).
Xue Rengui adalowa usilikali katatu, akutumikira monga msilikali wa chakudya.
Pamene Mfumu Taizong (Li Shimin) wa Mzera wa Tang anathamangitsidwa ndi Gaisu, anali pangozi ndipo anapulumutsidwa ndi Rengui.
Ndiye kuti, adatchedwa marshal ndi Emperor Taizong wa Mzera wa Tang, adatsogolera asitikali kum'mawa, ndipo adapeza zida zambiri zankhondo.
聖意: M’nyumba mwanu simukukomera, M’malo mwabwino, mwamwayi, mwamwayi, m’povuta kuchita malonda, Ukwati ndi wabwinobwino, Liujia ndi wabwino, anthu ali pafupi ndi munda, Mphutsi za silika zimabzalidwa msanga, Ziweto 6 zawonongeka. Anthu akusowa, milandu ya anthu onse ndi yolondola, kusamuka kuli bwino, katundu wotayika ndi wabwino, matenda amapezeka, tumizani kumanda kumapiri kuti mukhale mtendere.
